INSERT INTO `tb_iccid`(`id`, `city_id`, `city_name`, `sections`, `net_type`, `iccid`, `deal_status`, `order_id`, `consumer_id`, `stock_status`, `in_stock_date`, `out_stock_date`) select it.id, 0, null, '', null, it.iccid, 1, it.item_id, #{consumer}, 2, NOW(), NOW() from tb_iccid_temp it left join tb_iccid i on it.iccid = i.iccid and i.stock_status = 1 and i.deal_status = 1 where it.order_id = #{orderId} and ifnull(i.id,99) = 99
mapper.update: update tb_iccid i set i.stock_status = 2, i.out_stock_date = NOW(), i.consumer_id = #{consumer}, i.order_id = (select it.item_id from tb_iccid_temp it where i.iccid = it.iccid and it.order_id = #{orderId}) where i.stock_status = 1 and i.deal_status = '1' and i.iccid in (select t.iccid from tb_iccid_temp t where t.order_id = #{orderId})
mapper.delete: delete it from tb_iccid_temp it where it.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select it.item_id itemId, count(*) count from tb_iccid_temp it where it.order_id = #{orderId} group by it.item_id

select i.* from tb_iccid i left join tb_section_change_cofig scc on i.net_type = scc.net_type and i.city_id = scc.city_id and scc.is_del = 0, tb_order_item oi, tb_num n where i.order_id = oi.p_item_id and oi.num_id = n.id and ( n.`status` != 4 /*号码状态不正确*/ or i.consumer_id != n.buyer_id /*号码归属错误*/ /*-- or i.sections != n.section_no */ or scc.id is null /*未配置号段是否可串*/ or (scc.is_change = 0 and i.sections != n.section_no) /* 不可串时，号段不一致*/ or (scc.is_change = 1 and (i.city_id != n.city_id or i.net_type != n.net_type )) /* 可串时，制式地市不一致*/ ) and i.order_id = #{item_id};
